title: Create & access your staging environment for A/B test QA with Requestly
description: Building experiments requires publishing experimental code to your website. In order to protect your mission-critical apps, it's recommended you publish and test code in a STAGING environment before you publish it into PRODUCTION. Doing so lets you catch heinous bugs before your users may encounter them.
